articles.title: Tiny surgical robots could transform detection and treatment of cancers - University of Leeds
articles.description: A tiny robot which can travel deep into the lungs to detect and treat the first signs of cancer has been developed by researchers at the University of Leeds.
articles.content:

articles.author: Emily Stearn
articles.title: Diets that are just 10% ultra-processed may raise risk of early death - Daily Mail
articles.description: A study of more than 1,000 people with type 2 diabetes in Italy found that those who ate the most junk food were 60 per cent more likely to die early than those eating the least.
articles.content:
Eating ultra-processed foods can 'substantially' increase the risk of death for diabetics - even if they follow a healthy diet most of the time.
